===========
Django Belt
===========

Simple package with some utilities for Django.

Quick start
-----------

**1** Install using pip::

    pip install django-belt

**2** Add "belt" to your INSTALLED_APPS settings like this::

    INSTALLED_APPS += ('belt',)





History
-------

1.0a2 (2017-2-21)
+++++++++++++++++

* Added generators module.
* Added admin widget fot ForeignKeys

1.0a1 (2017-2-20)
+++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
